title: Title A - Vacation Leave: Calendar Year Employees and College Year Employees
content:
Title A - Vacation Leave: Calendar Year Employees and College Year Employees

State Regulations
§ 337.2 - Accrual of vacation leave
§ 337.3 - Maximum accumulation
§ 337.4 - Authorization for use
§ 337.5 - Charges

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
